mapper.select:
select o.ORGPKVALUE,o.name name,p.name pname from sys_org o left join sys_org p on o.PARENTPKVALUE=p.ORGPKVALUE where 1 = 1
and o.name like '%${NAME}%'

select * from sys_group_user_reportingunit g where g.reportingunit_id= (select orgpkvalue from sys_org o where o.PARENTPKVALUE=( select orgpkvalue from sys_org where code=#{rootCode}) start with o.CATEGORYCODE = 'Dept' and o.orgpkvalue=( select decode(orgcode,#{rootCode}, deptpkvalue, orgpkvalue) from sys_user u where u.UUID=#{userId}) connect by orgpkvalue=prior parentpkvalue union select orgpkvalue from sys_org so where exists (select 1 from sys_group_user_reportingunit gr where gr.reportingunit_id=so.ORGPKVALUE ) start with so.CATEGORYCODE='Org' and so.ORGPKVALUE=( select decode(orgcode,#{rootCode}, deptpkvalue, orgpkvalue) from sys_user u where u.UUID=#{userId}) connect by orgpkvalue=prior parentpkvalue)
select reportingunit_name orgname, reportingunit_id orgid,companyheader_name fzrname, companyheader_id fzrid from sys_group_user_reportingunit g where 1=1 and reportingunit_name like '%${orgname}%'

select o.ORGPKVALUE as id, o.PARENTPKVALUE as pid, o.NAME, o.ISPARENT, o.CATEGORYCODE from sys_org_ext o where o.CATEGORYCODE='Org'
and o.PARENTPKVALUE = #{parentId}
and o.PARENTPKVALUE is null
order by o.CATEGORYCODE, o.CODE

select o.* from sys_org o where o.PARENTPKVALUE = (select orgpkvalue from sys_org obj where obj.CODE = #{code}) start with o.orgpkvalue = #{reportUnitId} connect by o.orgpkvalue = prior o.PARENTPKVALUE
